item.title: Android release
item.description: - Fixed issue with rates not auto updating (when rates dashboard view is not visited at least once)

item.title: iOS release
item.description: - Fixed issue with rates not auto updating (when rates dashboard view is not visited at least once) - swipe-back navigation gesture not working when on some pages

item.title: Android release
item.description: - Show local notification when biometrics is enabled on registration - Fix grey screen on rates when new rates data is available

item.title: iOS release
item.description: - Show local notification when biometrics is enabled on registration - Fix grey screen on rates when new rates data is available
